title: Metrics
description: Schema for submitting metadata for various processing metrics.

mean_reads_per_cell.title: Mean reads per cell
mean_reads_per_cell.description: Total number of reads divided by estimated number of cells.

percent_valid_barcodes.title: Percent valid barcodes
percent_valid_barcodes.description: Percentage of reads with cell barcodes that match the whitelist.

percent_sequencing_saturation.title: Percent sequencing saturation
percent_sequencing_saturation.description: Percentage of reads originating from an already-observed UMI.

percent_q30_bases_in_barcode.title: Percent Q30 bases in barcode
percent_q30_bases_in_barcode.description: Percentage of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the cell barcode sequences.

percent_q30_bases_in_sample_index.title: Percent Q30 bases in sample index
percent_q30_bases_in_sample_index.description: Percentage of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the sample index sequences.

percent_q30_bases_in_umi.title: Percent Q30 bases in umi
percent_q30_bases_in_umi.description: Percentage of bases with Q-score of at least 30 in the UMI sequences.

percent_reads_in_cells.title: Percent reads in cells
percent_reads_in_cells.description: Percentage of cell-barcoded, confidently mapped reasds with cell-associated barcodes.
